entry.title: Reader
entry.summary: Reads any English input via realistic AI narration. Each output is downloadable in compressed WAV format. This tool was created as part of a larger project named MyCompass. It's running solely on a Ryzen 5500 and RTX 3060, so pls don't abuse it.
entry.content:
Reads any English input via realistic AI narration. Each output is downloadable in compressed WAV format. This tool was created as part of a larger project named MyCompass. It's running solely on a Ryzen 5500 and RTX 3060, so pls don't abuse it.
